title: ninna maganEnE
sahitya:
ninna maganEnE gOpi gOpamma ninna maganEnE gOpi


anupallavi

  cennAra celuva uDupiya krSNana bAla ninna maganEnE gOpi


caraNam 1    kaTavAya beNNe gADigegaNNu kaTisutra paTavALi kaipa koraLoLu padaka 
saTeyalla brahmANDa hrdayadoLitiralu miTimiTi nODuva I muddu krSNa
    caraNam 2    munguruLa munjeDe bangAradaraLele rangumANikada unguraviTTu
pongejje kAlalanduge ghillu ghillenuta angaLadoLagADutiha muddu krSNa
    caraNam 3    hariva hAvane kaNDu heDe hiDidu Aduva karuvAgi AkaLa moleyuNNuva 
ariyadATava balla antarangada svAmi dhareyoLadhikanAda purandara viTTalayya
